name: Pomao Falls In A Hole
description:
Pomao has fallen into a hole, help him earn enough fruit to buy 11 balloons so that he can float back out.
Shoot items in the store to purchase them.

Keyboard:
WASD to move, Space to shoot

Controller:
Left stick to move, 'A' to shoot and jump

Tap/Click:
When you tap, pomao will move left or tight to go toward your tap, and also shoot/jump.
